alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:56PM CDT until May 19 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Garland County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... West central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Norman, or 10 miles south of Mount Ida, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Norman... Meyers... Point Cedar... Bonnerdale... Crystal Springs Landing... Welsh... Pearcy... Crystal Springs... Caddo Gap... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike
